Var fågel sjunger efter sin egen näbb.
Var skall sleven vara om inte i grytan?
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: Let him that is cold blow the coals.

column3: Each household has its own customs.

Varav hjärtat är fullt talar munnen.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: The tongue ever turns to the aching tooth; What the heart thinketh the tongue speaketh.
Every cloud has a silver lining.
column3: Bad situations often bring something good with them.
Things that happen in real life are often far more unlikely than those dreamed up by writers.

Vill man vara fin får man lida pin.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: No pain, no gain; Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Vis är den som råd lyder, men oråd skall ingen lyda.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: Those are wise that heed advice, but no one should heed dissuasive advice.
column3: Advice often contain a genuine warning or an effective suggestion, which is unprudent not to take into consideration.

Visdomen har långa öron och kort tunga.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: Nature gave us two ears and one mouth.

Väck inte den björn som sover.
column3: Do not cause trouble by disturbing a stable—but potentially problematic—situation.

Vännens örfil är ärligt menad, fiendens kyssar vill bedra.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: A friend’s frown is better than a foe’s smile.

Vägen till helvetet är kantad med goda föresatser.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: The road to hell is paved with good intentions.

Vägen till mannens hjärta går genom magen.
Sufficient untill the day is the evil th: The way to a man’s heart is through his stomach.
column3: The best way to please a man is by feeding him well.
Someone you are talking about will often overhear your conversation.

It is amazing how often you meet somebody you know—or somebody who knows one of your friends or relatives, comes from your home town, or went to your school—in a distant or unexpected place; said when such a coincidence occurs.
